name: My Choice Fresh Strawberry
description: My Choice Fresh Strawberries are hand-picked and carefully selected for their sweet taste, juicy texture, and deep red color. These premium strawberries are packed with nutrients and antioxidants, making them a healthy and delicious addition to any diet. The heart-shaped silhouette of the strawberry is the first clue that this fruit is good for you. *Images are illustration purpose only, product received may vary.
